sentences.sentence: We are tired of the globalist network of power.
sentences.translation: 我们厌倦了全球化的权钱网络。

sentences.sentence: For some time to come, there will be major jobs of the globalist variety in management.
sentences.translation: 在今后一段时间里，管理行业的主要工作将是全球范围的，又是多种多样的。

sentences.sentence: The debate now is over just how effective this anti-globalist coalition will turn out to be.
sentences.translation: 现在辩论的范围已经不再仅仅局限于讨论这种反全球化联合有多大作用。
